title: Deck of oddities
data:
{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Virtual item |name=deck of oddities |weight=0 }} {{flavour|A deck of magical cards which is not one deck, but all.}} {{flavour|This card doesn't seem to belong here.}} The '''deck of oddities''' is a wild card [[deck]] whose cards may appear unexpectedly in any deck. When a player draws from a deck, there is always a 1% chance to draw from the '''deck of oddities''' instead. It is considered a 'virtual' deck since it cannot be found independently.
